T02D2280:134a-1: do ha ko sha n'a ma /
T02D2280:134a-3: do ha mdzod ces bya ba /
T02D2280:134a-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2280:134a-5: bcom ldan 'das bdag med ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2280:134a-7: srid dang zhi ba phyag rgya chen po ni //
T02D2280:134a-8: ngo bo nyid kyis mkha' ltar rnam par dag /
T02D2280:134a-9: mtshon bya'i gnas lugs med pas tha snyad tshig lam
T02D2280:134a-10: chad // rang bzhin spros med ngo bo ltos chos kun dang bral ;
T02D2280:134a-11: / brtag dang dpyad du med cing mtshon pa'i dpe dang bral //
T02D2280:134a-12: dpe bral nyid la'ang mi gnas blo yi yul las 'das //
T02D2280:134a-13: rtag min chad min 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa min //
T02D2280:134a-14: snang min stong min dngos dang dngos med skye med min //
T02D2280:134a-15: chos nyid gnyug ma ma yin blo las 'das pa'ang min //
T02D2280:134a-16: min pa'ang min zhing yin min blo yis brjod med phyir //
T02D2280:134a-17: gnyis chos gang dang 'brel med gzod nas mnyam pa nyid //
T02D2280:134a-18: ngo bo des tshig byed pa'i las rnams bshad pa yang //
T02D2280:134a-19: ri bang rva brdzun de yi rno rtul brdzun dang mtshungs //
T02D2280:134a-20: chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid de dang khyad par med //
T02D2280:134a-21: ji ltar snang zhing srid pa'i kun rdzob chos can rnams //
T02D2280:134a-22: ngo bo nyid med ming tsam sgra tsam btags pa tsam //
T02D2280:134a-23: ming dang don la khyad par bye brag cung zad med //
T02D2280:134a-24: gdod nas lhan cig skyes pas gzhan nas btsal du med //
T02D2280:134a-25: sems nyid ming stong spros bral phyag rgya chen po ste //
T02D2280:134a-26: nam mkha' rang bzhin gdod nas ming stong yin dang mtshungs //
T02D2280:134a-27: ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes mtshan ma'i spros dang bral //
T02D2280:134a-28: mkha' ltar kun la khyab cing 'pho dang 'gyur ba med //
T02D2280:134a-29: dus rnams kun du stong zhing ye nas bdag med de //
T02D2280:134a-30: dran rtog mtshan ma med de smig rgyu'i chu bo ltar //
T02D2280:134a-31: ma bcing ma grol gnyug ma'i ngang las ma g-yos so //
T02D2280:134b-0: sems can thams cad phyag rgya cher po'i sprul pa @134b la ;
T02D2280:134b-1: ; sprul pa'i ngo bo ye shes nas skya mad chos kyi dbyings //
T02D2280:134b-2: bde sdug la sogs gnyis snang mtshan ma thams cad kyang //
T02D2280:134b-3: chos nyid gnyug ma phyag rgya chen po'i rol pa'o //
T02D2280:134b-4: rol pa nyid la bden med mi brtan 'gyur ba'i phyir //
T02D2280:134b-5: gnas lugs stong pa'i rgya las nam yang ma 'das so //
T02D2280:134b-6: kha cig dbang bskur ba yis yongs su gdung bar byad //
T02D2280:134b-7: kha cig h'um phat zer zhing phreng ba yongs su bgrang //
T02D2280:134b-8: kha cig bshang ci khrag dang khu ba sha rnams za //
T02D2280:134b-9: kha cig rtsa dang rlung gi rnal 'byor bsgom ste yongs su 'khrul //
T02D2280:134b-11: bla ma dam pas zin pas cig shos 'di ltar rtogs //
T02D2280:134b-12: gang yang 'khrul pa yin phyir yang dag rtogs pa med //
T02D2280:134b-13: rtogs bya rtogs byed med pas phyogs ris mtha' dang bral ;
T02D2280:134b-14: / bral dang ma bral med pas mnyam nyid gnyug ma'i ngang //
T02D2280:134b-15: 'di ltar rtogs na ngas par gzhan du dri sa med //
T02D2280:134b-16: sna tshogs chos skur gsal bas spong len sems mi 'byung //
T02D2280:134b-17: bsgom dang mi bsgom med cing mtshan mas gos pa med //
T02D2280:134b-18: snang dang mi snang yul la nam yang brten mi byed //
T02D2280:134b-19: bya dang byed pa'i sems med dmigs pa kun dang bral //
T02D2280:134b-20: re dang dog pa'i sems med kun la zhen pa
T02D2280:134b-21: log / bla ma sa bstan pas gnyug ma'i gnas
T02D2280:134b-23: dran rig sna tshogs chos kyi dbyings su rang rlag ste //
T02D2280:134b-24: rnam shes yul la mi gnas chags zhen kun bral bas //
T02D2280:134b-25: ma bcos gnyug ma'i ngang du chos kun grol bar 'gyur //
T02D2280:134b-26: kun la ma chags nga rgyal la sogs dri ma bral //
T02D2280:134b-27: gus par ldan zhing dam pas yongs su zin pa dang //
T02D2280:134b-28: gang yang yid byed bral na dri med the tshom med //
T02D2280:134b-29: shes dang shes bya dag pas chos nyid mngon sum 'char //
T02D2280:134b-30: gnyug ma phyag rgya chen po rtogs par ma gyur na //
T02D2280:134b-31: rtag tu gnyis 'dzin dbang gis kun la zhen gyur pas //
T02D2280:134b-32: bsam rig rab rib sna tshogs rgyun du skye 'gyur zhing //
T02D2280:135a-1: don la mi gnas srid par 'khor zhing 'khyam //
T02D2280:135a-2: snyan grags bsnyen bkur kun la chags zhing zhen pa dang //
T02D2280:135a-3: thos bsam go rtogs che dang nyams myong bzang po dang //
T02D2280:135a-4: dngos grub byin rlabs nus pa'i rtags byung bcos ma'i lam ;
T02D2280:135a-5: ; don gyis dri ma yin phyir mkhas pas yid mi gtad //
T02D2280:135a-6: de nyid yid la byed cing gnyis mtha'i phyogs lhung na //
T02D2280:135a-7: 'khor bar 'khor zhing srid pa'i rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir //
T02D2280:135a-8: kun gyi gzhi rtsa yid kyi ri bo gang yin ltos //
T02D2280:135a-9: bltas pas ma mthong yid dang bral na nges par grol //
T02D2280:135a-10: sems kyis chos kyi dbyings la 'di zhes med pas na //
T02D2280:135a-11: de la sgom dang bsgom par bya ba gnyis su med //
T02D2280:135a-12: yod med cir yang mi rtog ma yengs ngang la
T02D2280:135a-13: zhog / stong pa nyid dang skye med blo las
T02D2280:135a-14: 'das pa dang // mtha' bral la sogs gang yang yid la byed pa na //
T02D2280:135a-15: gnas lugs don la mi gnas shin tu yengs pa'o //
T02D2280:135a-16: stong dang mi stong rtsis med lhug pa'i ngang la
T02D2280:135a-17: zhog / gzhag dang mi gzhag med par rang dga'
T02D2280:135a-18: yan par thong // btang dang bzung ba'i sems med ro langs ji bzhin gyis//
T02D2280:135a-19: de nyid gnas lugs rig nas de yi ngang gnas na //
T02D2280:135a-20: gnyis snang mtshan ma'i bag chags myur du 'jig par 'gyur //
T02D2280:135a-21: rtogs pa'i ngang la mi gnas mtshan mas g-yengs gyur na //
T02D2280:135a-22: gnyis snang mtshan ma'i bag chags ldog par mi 'gyur te //
T02D2280:135a-23: rab rib can gyi mig gi nang du shes gyur kyang //
T02D2280:135a-24: mig gi nad ma byang bar rang rib snang mi
T02D2280:135a-25: ldog / gnas lugs yid la byed cing nyams la
T02D2280:135a-26: zhen pa dang // de nyid don la goms shing bsgoms na gol ba'i rgyu //
T02D2280:135a-27: mthun 'jug rnams la chags sdang skye phyir 'ching ba'o //
T02D2280:135a-28: mi mthun rkyen ngan thams cad dngos grub dam pa ste //
T02D2280:135a-29: mi mthun rkyen gyis rnal 'byor nyams kyi gsal 'debs phyir //
T02D2280:135a-30: rkyen ngan mi spang de nyid shes pas de la sbyang //
T02D2280:135a-31: de ltar skyong zhing nyams rtogs mthar 'byin spyod pa ste//
T02D2280:135b-0: @135b gyi ling dag la lcag gis bskul ba ji bzhin no /
T02D2280:135b-1: gal te rtogs ldan nyams bzang spyod pa'i grogs med na //
T02D2280:135b-2: ji ltar mi ldan skyes bu dag ni rkang pa med dang mtshungs //
T02D2280:135b-3: don dam rnal ma chags med don la sbyang bya ste //
T02D2280:135b-4: mi spang mi sgrub mi zhen mi spyod mi 'gog par //
T02D2280:135b-5: rang lus ci bder spyod pa rab mchog dam pa'o //
T02D2280:135b-6: kun rdzob sangs rgyas mi ro'i gdeng chen ldan gyur kyang //
T02D2280:135b-7: sems can tshogs chen mi spang ci nus 'bad par bya //
T02D2280:135b-8: 'khor ba dag la dog pa'i sems med 'jigs bral yang//
T02D2280:135b-9: sdig pa'i las rnams phra mo dag nas 'dzem par bya //
T02D2280:135b-10: chos rnams stong pa mkha' ltar rtsa bral rtogs gyur kyang //
T02D2280:135b-11: chags sdang 'dzin chags mtha' dag rtsad nas spang bar bya //
T02D2280:135b-12: chos nyid mtha' bral zang thal chen po'i don rtogs kyang //
T02D2280:135b-13: brtan pa ma thob bar du nyams rtogs gzhan la gsang //
T02D2280:135b-14: don dam bdag gzhan gnyis su med pa rtogs gyur kyang //
T02D2280:135b-15: kun rdzob 'gro la phan pa'i don chen dag la bsam //
T02D2280:135b-16: 'dren pa gzhan la mi ltos gdeng dang ldan gyur kyang //
T02D2280:135b-17: bka' drin can gyi bla ma spyi bo'i gtsug tu bkur //
T02D2280:135b-18: chags shing zhen par bcas pas kun la dgag sgrub byed //
T02D2280:135b-19: rgyud dang mi 'tsham 'gal ba'i spyod pa gol ba'o //
T02D2280:135b-20: mthong bya mthong byed med pas tha dad rang sar grol //
T02D2280:135b-21: nyams su myong mkhan stor bas rtsol sgrub kun dang bral ;
T02D2280:135b-22: / thob bya'i 'bras bu stor bas re don kun las grol //
T02D2280:135b-23: nga bdag rtsang nas thon pas bdud kyi g-yul las rgyal //
T02D2280:135b-24: dngos 'dzin rang sar zhig pas 'khor 'das kun la grol //
T02D2280:135b-25: rig pa gzhi la dag pas rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes brjod //
T02D2280:135b-26: chos blo zad sar zad pas mya ngan 'das zhes bshad pa'i phyir //
T02D2280:135b-27: ma bcos ma bsgyur spangs thob kun las yongs su grol //
T02D2280:135b-29: phyag rgya chen po zhes bya zab mo'i sgra chen de //
T02D2280:136a-0: gdags gzhi gang yin stong pa zhes bya'ang btags pa tsam @136a * //
T02D2280:136a-1: skad cig ngo bos stong par bdag med su yis rtogs //
T02D2280:136a-2: rtog mkhan nyid med ming tsam sgra tsam btags pa tsam //
T02D2280:136a-3: de nyid yang dag ma yin gdul bya'i snang ba'o //
T02D2280:136a-4: gdul bya nyid la'ang bdag med sgyu ma sprul pa 'dra //
T02D2280:136a-5: phyag rgya chen po zhes bya byis pa'i blos brtags so //
T02D2280:136a-6: 'khrul dang ma 'khrul zhes bya ming tsam btags pa tsam //
T02D2280:136a-7: 'khrul par tshor zhing rig pa'i skyes bu su zhig yin //
T02D2280:136a-8: 'bras bu myang 'das rdul tsam mad cing mi dmigs na //
T02D2280:136a-9: grol dang ma grol zhes bya glo bur sgro btags te //
T02D2280:136a-10: nam mkha' zhi zhing dag la med pa grol lam ci //
T02D2280:136a-11: kun rdzob don dam zhes bya'ang nan gyis btags pa sta //
T02D2280:136a-12: chos kyi dbyings la ba dan pa gnyis med chos dbyings med //
T02D2280:136a-13: do ha mdzod ces bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug birwa pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2280:136a-15: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shr'i bee ro tsa nas rang 'gyur du bsgyur ba'o /
